commit.message: Use proper lowercase "k" for kB measurements

files.patch:
@@ -92,7 +92,7 @@ Maximum per\-connection send buffer, <n>*1000 bytes (default: 1000)
 Use UPnP to map the listening port (default: 1 when listening)
 .TP
 \fB\-paytxfee=\fR<amt>
-Fee per KB to add to transactions you send
+Fee per kB to add to transactions you send
 .TP
 \fB\-server\fR
 Accept command line and JSON\-RPC commands

@@ -37,7 +37,7 @@ Add a node to connect to
 Connect only to the specified node
 .TP
 \fB\-paytxfee=\fR<amt>
-Fee per KB to add to transactions you send
+Fee per kB to add to transactions you send
 .TP
 \fB\-server\fR
 Accept command line and JSON\-RPC commands
